mudServer.Items
Class ItemStd

java.lang.Object
  mudServer.Items.ItemStd
Direct Known Subclasses:
Container, generalItem
public abstract class ItemStd
extends java.lang.Object

ItemStd sets data members common to all Items. It also Defines and implements methods that are the same no matter what kind of item uses it.

Author:
Nemesis
